issue.title: [C++] Refactor Parquet Code Samples to use Result<T> APIs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the Parquet code samples use the (now deprecated by ARROW-7235) `Status`-returning functions.

See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5994>

this also closes ARROW-7352 which was opened is the wrong JIRA by mistake.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7356?focusedCommentId=16991633) by Gal Lushi (gallushi):*
opened again by mistake
